mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_profile (user_email, user_password, user_name, user_birth, user_phone, user_zip_code, user_address, user_daddress, user_grade) VALUES(#{user_email}, #{user_password}, #{user_name}, #{user_birth}, #{user_phone}, #{user_zip_code}, #{user_address}, #{user_daddress}, #{user_grade})
